name: The Notable Phantom
description:
The Notable Phantom is a music identification program.

The player identifies music notes on a musical staff. Three creatures can deliver notes: ghosts which deliver sound and position, spiders which deliver just note names, and phantoms which deliver sound only.. A point is rewarded for pressing the identifying the the with the keyboard. The player can also create their own musical score.
alsoFor: Apple II, Commodore 64, DOS | Combined View
